metadata.title: CVE-2022-39188 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in include/asm-generic/tlb.h in the Linux kernelbefore 5.19. Because of a race condition (unmap_mapping_range versusmunmap), a device driver can free a page while it still has stale TLBentries. This only occurs in situations with VM_PFNMAP VMAs.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
